org.codehaus.griffon.compile.core.ast.transform

Class ThreadingAwareASTTransformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codehaus.griffon.compile.core.ast.transform.AbstractASTTransformation
      • org.codehaus.griffon.compile.core.ast.transform.ThreadingAwareASTTransformation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnnotationHandler, BaseConstants, ThreadingAwareConstants, org.codehaus.groovy.transform.ASTTransformation

    @AnnotationHandlerFor(value=ThreadingAware.class)
public class ThreadingAwareASTTransformation
extends AbstractASTTransformation
implements ThreadingAwareConstants, AnnotationHandler
    Handles generation of code for the @ThreadingAware annotation.
    Author:
    Andres Almiray

        Convenience method to see if an annotated node is @ThreadingAware.

        Returns:
        true if the node is an event publisher
